author: Tim Simoneau
comment: Would be nice if it worked better.

author: Timothy Apjok
comment: I'll update my review when you allow me to download the entire bible for when I don't have Internet connection.  Other than that, love it.

reply.author: MEF Applications
reply.content: Thank you for the comments. I have to be careful of copyright laws downloading certain Bible versions but I'll see what I can do. God Bless!

title: Storage.

author: Adam P
comment: Works perfectly! Such a good idea and it's designed well and easy to use! Thanks

reply.author: MEF Applications
reply.content: Thank you for the wonderful comments. I'm planning to release more features soon. God bless!

title: Best Wear App

comment: I really like this app. But, it has stopped working.  It works on the phone, but the watch doesn't bring up the verses anymore.  Edit... Accessing on the watch is spotty.  Sometimes the verses come and sometimes they don't.  I'm keeping it, but I certainly wouldn't pay for it until the issue gets fixed.

reply.author: MEF Applications
reply.content: Thank you for the comments. Try the new version 1.2 and see if that works better for you. God Bless!

author: Stewart Said
comment: I'm not sure which other books are affected but Jude 1-25 is actually Judges 1:1-25. Please update. God Bless!

reply.author: MEF Applications
reply.content: Thank you for the comments. I have fixed the Jude/Judges bug with version 1.2. Thanks for pointing it out. God Bless!

title: Wrong scriptures

author: Michael W
comment: Wish you could change the font size, and also would be great to have a daily scripture quote for the day popup on the Watch screen with option to read the entire chapter on the watch or open on the phone. Great app though👏

reply.author: MEF Applications
reply.content: Thank you for the comments. Version 1.2 has a Verse of the day notification option. Font size controls are planned for the next version. God Bless!

title: Nice and also free, BUT

author: Paul Maffin
comment: Thank you! I appreciate your effort to bring the Bible to Android Wear. Nearly everything works on my Asus Zenwatch (1st gen) except for the ESV verse chooser on the watch, which returns an error message (No response was received from your phone....) Other versions work fine. I agree that a slightly larger font option would be great.

reply.author: MEF Applications
reply.content: Thank you for the comments. Try the new version 1.2 to see if that works better with the ESV version. Font size controls are planned for the next version. God Bless!

title: Great Start on a Needed App

author: Kevin Hatfield
comment: The idea is great! It works and if does what it says it does. No complaints here other than it needs more features but ik there are plans for them. Will rate 5 star when it gets better

reply.author: MEF Applications
reply.content: Thank you for the comments. Version 1.2 adds a few more features and more are on the way. God Bless!

title: Great but needs more features

author: Deb Brickle
comment: Love, love being able to grab refreshment from the Word during the day! Anyway you could increase font for old eyes and add ESV version? Great work!

reply.author: MEF Applications
reply.content: Thank you for the comments. In the new version 1.2 go to Wear Bible on your phone and change the Service Provider to Digital Bible Platform for ESV version. Font size controls are planned for the next version. God Bless!

title: Great.. Could you please?

author: Alex P
comment: Just started using it and it works fine. Would be nice if there was an option to change the text size. And adding the New kings James to the list would be nice also

reply.author: MEF Applications
reply.content: Thank you for the comments. Font size controls are planned for the next version and I'm working to add more Bible versions as well. God Bless!

title: Works on Moto 360

author: Nader Yassa
comment: Great. Thank you so much for doing it. BUT PLEASE give us the option to increase the font as it's tiny. Thanks again

reply.author: MEF Applications
reply.content: Thank you for the comments. Font size controls are planned for the next version. God Bless!

author: les mclane

reply.author: MEF Applications
reply.content: Thank you for the comments. God Bless!

title: Really works on my watch.some don't.

author: #85filmz #85filmz
comment: I like it but I can't change the scripture help please moto 360 2nd

reply.author: MEF Applications
reply.content: Thank you for your feeback. I have a new version that has been rewritten and is more stable. I hope to have that out soon. It may resolve this issue. Thanks and God Bless!
